name: Leslie's Salty Grilled Potatoes
author: Leslie
summary: These fantastic grilled potatoes will have everyone eating the skin! But be careful, no other baked potato will do after this. So be prepared to make it again.
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-low heat
Prepare four foil squares large enough to fold over one potato each
Spread butter onto foil in a large enough area that the potato will be completely covered when rolled up
Sprinkle salt, garlic, pepper, and Italian seasoning evenly over foil
Roll each potato in the foil; puncture the package (including the potato) with a fork or knife a few times
Grill for 1 hour, or until soft, turning the potatoes often
